Source.Name: kde-l10n
Source.Description: kde-l10n, includes language packs for KDE.

Package.Name: kde-l10n-en_GB-doc
Package.Summary: British English documentation files for KDE

Package.Name: kde-l10n-nds-doc
Package.Summary: Low Saxon documentation files for KDE

Package.Name: kde-l10n-nn-doc
Package.Summary: Norwegian Nynorsk documentation files for KDE

Package.Name: kde-l10n-pt_BR-doc
Package.Summary: Brasilian Portuguese documentation files for KDE

Package.Name: kde-l10n-zh_CN-doc
Package.Summary: Chinese Simplified documentation files for KDE

Package.Name: kde-l10n-zh_TW-doc
Package.Summary: Chinese Traditional documentation files for KDE
